name: tgfx
description: A lightweight 2D graphics library for rendering texts, geometries, and images with high-performance APIs that work across various platforms.

angle.description: Enable building with the ANGLE library

async-promise.description: Enable async promises for loading images on the web

drawers.description: Enable building the tgfx-drawers library for testing

exclude-faster-blur.description: Disable the faster blur algorithm and use standard Gaussian blur (faster blur is enabled by default)

exclude-opengl.description: Disable OpenGL as the GPU backend (OpenGL is enabled by default)

qt.description: Enable building with the Qt framework

swiftshader.description: Enable building with the SwiftShader library
